gurmukhi: Anyk dys BrmxM ] kror dwn sMjmM ]
transliteration: Anek Des Bharamanndng|| Daror Daan Sanjamannd||
translation: One may wander in many countries; he may adopt the discipline of giving million of charities.

gurmukhi: Anyk gIq igAwnnM ] AnMq igAwn iDAwnnM ]18]96]
transliteration: Anek Geet Giananan|| Anant Giaan Dhiaananan||18||96||
translation: Many songs of knowledge are sung; he may be proficient in innumerable types of knowledge and contemplation.18.96.

gurmukhi: AnMq igAwn su`qmM ] Anyk kiRq su biRqM ]
transliteration: Anant Giaan Souttamannd|| Anek Krit Su Britan||
translation: Those who are superb by achieving millions of types of knowledge; they are also observing many good actions.

gurmukhi: ibAws nwrd AwdkM ] su bHmu mrm nih lhM ]19]97]
transliteration: Biaas Naarad Aadakan|| Su Brahm(u) Maram Nah(i) Lahan||19||97||
translation: Like Vyas, Narad etc., they even have not been able to know the secret of a Brahman.19.97.

gurmukhi: kror jMqR mMqRxM ] AnMq qMqRxM bxM ]
transliteration: Daror Jantra Mantranan|| Anant Tantranan Banan||
translation: Though millions of yantras and mantras may be practiced; and innumerable Tantras may be made.

gurmukhi: bsyK bXws nwsnM ] AnMq nXws pRwsnM ]20]98]
transliteration: Basekh Byaas Naasanan|| Anant Nyaas Praasanan||20||98||
translation: One may even sit on the seat of Vyas; and forsake many types of food.20.98.

gurmukhi: jpMq dyv dYqnM ] QpMq j`C gMDRbM ]
transliteration: Japant Dev Daitanan|| Thapant Jachchh Gaddhraban||
translation: All the gods and demons remember Him; all the Yakshas and Gandharvas worship Him.

gurmukhi: bdMq ib`dxo DrM ] gxMq sys aurgxM ]21]99]
transliteration: Badant Biddano Dharan|| Gadant Ses Udgadan||21||99||
translation: The Visyadhars sing His Prises; the reamaing categories including Nagas remember His Name.21.99.
He is remembered by all in this and other worlds; he hath put the seven oceans at their places.

gurmukhi: jxMq cwr ckRxM ] DRmMq ckR bkRxM ]22]100]
transliteration: Japant Chaar Chakranan|| Dhramannd Charka Bakranan||22||100||
translation: He is known in all the four directions; the wheel of His Discipline keeps moving.22.100.

gurmukhi: jpMq pMngM nkM ] brM nrM bnspqM ]
transliteration: Japant Pannagadg Nakan|| Baran Naran Banaspatan||
translation: He is remembered by serpents and octopus; the vegetation narrates His Praises.

gurmukhi: Akws aurbIAM jlM ] jpMq jIv jl QlM ]23]101]
transliteration: Akaas Urbeean Jalan|| Japant Jeev Jal Thalan||23||101||
translation: The beings of sky, earth and water remember Him; the beings in water and on land repeat His Name.23.101.

gurmukhi: su kot ckR bkqRxM ] bdMq byd cqRkM ]
transliteration: Su Kot Charka Baktranan|| Badant Bed Chatrakan||
translation: Millions of four-headed Brahmas; recite the four Vedas.

gurmukhi: AsMB AsMB mwnIAY ] kror ibsn TwnIAY ]24]102]
transliteration: Asanbh Asanbh Maaneeai|| Daror Bisan Thaaneeai||24||102||
translation: Millions of Shiva worship that Wonderful Entity; millions of Vishnus adore Him.24.102.
